“6 weeks pregnant” = 2 weeks late on your period.

So this is a backdoor ban. https://twitter.com/cbsnews/status/1125778778377027589 QT @CBSNews BREAKING: Abortions after six weeks will now be illegal in Georgia as Gov. RT @CountyBerkshire The #CAREact will save lives by directing federal funding to #opioid prevention & medication treatments. The opioid epidemic has destroyed so many lives and caused nearly 150 overdose deaths in #Berkshire County from 2013-2017. We applaud @SenWarren for her historic commitment. https://twitter.com/SenWarren/status/1126119749149253633 QT @SenWarren The #CAREact is the most ambitious legislation ever introduced in Congress to confront the opioid epidemic, & that's why 200+ organizations support this bill.
